scraped_data.name: Pratik Kundu
scraped_data.title:
Project Manager
Project Manager
scraped_data.bio:
Manager, Engagement Delivery at Salesforce | Ex-Deloitte
IT professional with over 10+ years experience in IT Consulting focusing primarily on Salesforce ecosystem as the Solution architect. 
Expertise on-time delivery involved in planning, architect & design followed by implementation of Salesforce SDLC.
Possesses rich experience on Salesforce Education Cloud, service cloud, sales cloud & Digital experience.
Led many successful RFPs and aided in estimation, planning, and Staffing.

Initially worked as a Siebel EAI and EIM developer and then transitioned to Salesforce as a developer & now as a Tech lead.
These varied experiences have helped in developing a blend of strong stakeholder (client/internal) facing and analytical/problem-solving skills. Being a quick learner along with the ability to absorb and adapt quickly has paid rich dividends so far.

Aspire to consistently harness the ever-growing spectrum of the Salesforce.com ecosystem to help businesses effectively strategize and accelerate their overall growth and operational efficiencies, and in the process benefit the end Customers and users in a significant way.

Salesforce Senior Consultant @Deloitte | 12x Salesforce Certified Application Architect | Lightning Expert | Agentforce Specialist
Experience Summary:
11 + years of experience in Salesforce Platform development.
Enthusiastic to work and learn new technologies. Good team player with good communication and problem-solving skills and to promote quality in the team environment.

Summary:
● Extensive experience in Salesforce development, configuration, and implementation
● Extensive experience in configuration, customization including creating custom objects, workflow rules, process builder, flows, approval process, email templates, lightning app builder
● Extensive experience in creating apex classes, Apex triggers, Visualforce pages, lightning aura components, and lightning web component (LWC)
● Experience in using VS Code & Intellij IDE to develop, enhance, test, and deploy applications on the force.com platform.
● Extensive domain knowledge on field service management application
● Experience in using Data loader for data import and export
● Extensive experience in integrating Salesforce with other applications
● Experience in tracking, managing, troubleshoot and resolve problems, technical issues, and configuration needs of Salesforce users
● Performed bulk data migration from one Org to another using Talend Open Studio, Data loader
● Experience in Salesforce migration from classic to lightning experience.

scraped_data.name: Ryan Dishman
scraped_data.title:
Salesforce
Salesforce
scraped_data.bio:
Sr. Manager, Information Security at Salesforce | LCDR USNR
As a cloud security professional I help organizations with regulatory compliance, framework adoption and resilience against emerging threats. My foundation is shaped by over a decade of military service and a M.S. in Cyber Systems and Operations.

My focus areas include AI security, governance, architecture, information risk management, identity and access management, privacy, encryption, and incident management—including triage and post-event communication. I've worked with a wide range of frameworks and standards, including FedRAMP Mod/High, DoD IL 2/4/5, CJIS, CMMC, CIS, NIST 800-53, NIST 800-171, IRS 1075, PCI-DSS, HITRUST, SOC 1/2/3, ISO 27000/31000, and the Authority to Operate (ATO) process.

scraped_data.name: Santhosh Rebello
scraped_data.title:
University Program Manager - India, Salesforce 
University Program Manager - India, Salesforce
scraped_data.bio:
Global Workforce Development & University Program Manager-India, Salesforce, Bangalore | Researcher in AI, ML & DL & NLP | International Relations | Industry Collaborations | Author | Educator
Working as Global Workforce Development and University Program Manager for India, at Salesforce from January 2022, promoting skill based training program at the Universities, Engineering and Technological campuses in India. 

Worked as the Professor of AI, ML & DL & Head at IT, St Aloysius Deemed to be University, Mangalore; He carries the teaching and mentoring experience in multidisciplinary such as IT and Business having the Masters in Computer Science, Philosophy, Business Management etc with focussed Research on Software Reliability.

He worked as Project Lead of the RISHII - Resources for Internationalization of Higher Education Institutions in India of ERASMUS+ from the European Union from Jan 2018 to December 2021

Worked towards Industry -Academia Collaboration and successfully collaborated with many IT / ITE Companies as a SPOC, Advisor and Coordinator for the Professional Program Design, Curriculum Design and Development

Served as the Coordinator of the Bioinformatics Facility (BIF) which is a part of BTIS Network, initiative from Dept of Biotechnology, Ministry of Science and Technology, Govt of India

Worked as Executive Member of the Core committee pf Karnataka Post Graduate Private College’s Association, Bangalore (with B Schools & IT Schools), which engages with UGC, AICTE, Govt of Karnataka for the Educational Leadership

Passionate Mentor and Certified Entrepreneurship Educator and International Jury for startup ventures by NEN/ Wadhwani Foundation Global for 4 years

Worked as President of Institute Innovation Council (IIC) of St Aloysius College (Autonomous), Mangalore; an initiative from Ministry of Skill Development and AICTE

Served as the Coordinator of the Indira Gandhi National Open University from Jan 2021 to December 2021 , served as the Asst Coordinator of IGNOU from Jan 2005 to December 2020

Authored Two Books, “Fundamental Simulation Methodologies Dwelling in Neural Networks-Algorithms, Mat lab Source Code”, “Soft Computing Methodologies for Cluster Analysis & Gene Prediction”, Published by LAP LAMBERT Academic Publishing, Germany.

Presented / Published 73 Research papers at the National / International Seminars / Conferences; Delivered 104 Guest Lectures on IT / ITES / Management / Analytics / AI & ML at various Institutions / Universities across India. Member & Advisor for Computer Society of India (CSI), Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE), Indian Statistical Institute , Kolkatta, ICT Academy, IIPS Society, Analytics Society of India, BCIL – New Delhi
…see more
